resources.string: How to play? simply click the circle when your brain thinks that the target time reached. The app will measure your brain age and response ability, which can be submitted to compete others by clicking the "Crown" image. If you want to know more about how important the brain balance is, please click the visit button.
You are not signed in. Please sign in first
You are not signed in. After sign-in, please click the "Crown" image to submit the result.
Do you want to submit your response ability (not the brain age) to the leaderboard?
